definition: Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: This graphite filled material offers the best bearing surface with hard chrome plated piston rod.
sentences.chinese: 這石墨填充材料提供了硬鍍鉻活塞桿最好的軸承表面。

sentences.english: The plunger is clamped into the crosshead .
The piston-rods connect the pistons to the parts of the engine which they move.
sentences.chinese: 活塞桿把活塞和引擎中被活塞驅動的部件連在一起。

sentences.english: The piston-rods connect the pistons to the parts of the engine which they move.
sentences.chinese: 活塞桿把活塞和引擎中被活塞驅動的部件連在一起。

sentences.english: The piston-rods connect the pistons to the parts of the engine which they move.
sentences.chinese: 活塞桿把活塞和引擎中被活塞驅動的部件連在一起。

sentences.english: The lug boss is completely arranged in an annular groove at the right end of the piston head.
sentences.chinese: 所述凸臺全部置於所述活塞頭右端的環狀槽內。

sentences.english: Cylinder sleeves, camshafts and piston pins can be coated with the new method.
sentences.chinese: 新塗層工藝適用於汽缸套，凸輪軸和活塞銷。

sentences.english: Gas with the piston movement from right to left and is gradually compressed.
sentences.chinese: 氣體隨着活塞從右往左運動而逐漸被緊縮。

sentences.english: A molecule striking an advancing piston recoils with increased speed.
sentences.chinese: 撞在前進中的活塞上的分子，會加速反跳。

sentences.english: The displacer piston now moves, shunting the gas to the cold end of the cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 活塞的置換現在動作，調氣，以冷戰結束缸。

sentences.english: Major production and distribution piston rings and valve seat.
sentences.chinese: 主要生產和經銷活塞環及氣門座圈。

sentences.english: The speed of movement of the piston rod depends on how fast the pressurized fluid enters the cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 活塞桿的速度取決於受壓液體進入液壓缸裏的多少。

sentences.english: Anticline and monocline are major trap types.
sentences.chinese: 主要的類型是往復式活塞發動機。

sentences.english: The new and trial-manufactured piston excelled the piston of original machine on each item of performances.
sentences.chinese: 新試製的活塞各項性能均優於原機活塞。

sentences.english: The new and trial-manufactured piston excelled the piston of original machine on each item of performances.
sentences.chinese: 新試製的活塞各項性能均優於原機活塞。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
